# snoozr <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of snoozr is to provide researchers with a toolkit for R to aid in the processing, description, and modeling of sleep data. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of snoozr like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("trackthatsleep/snoozr")
```
